languages.text: "Мы чтили Ваула, кузнеца и искусника. Но он не похож на ваше уродливое божество — он не пытался заменить наши души на скульптуры из призрачной кости".
"We venerated Vaul, the smith and craftsman, but he is nothing like your ugly deity — he has never sought to replace our souls with wraithbone sculptures."
languages.original_text: "Мы чтили Ваула, кузнеца и искусника. Но он не похож на ваше уродливое божество — он не пытался заменить наши души на скульптуры из призрачной кости".

traits.locale_text: "We venerated Vaul, the smith and craftsman, but he is nothing like your ugly deity — he has never sought to replace our souls with wraithbone sculptures."
"We venerated Vaul, the smith and craftsman, but he is nothing like your ugly deity — he has never sought to replace our souls with wraithbone sculptures."
"We venerated Vaul, the smith and craftsman, but he is nothing like your ugly deity — he has never sought to replace our souls with wraithbone sculptures."
"We venerated Vaul, the smith and craftsman, but he is nothing like your ugly deity — he has never sought to replace our souls with wraithbone sculptures."

languages.text: “我们尊崇精于冶炼和制造的沃尔，但他与你们丑陋的神祇不同，他从不试图用雕饰的灵骨取代我们的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "We venerated Vaul, the smith and craftsman, but he is nothing like your ugly deity — he has never sought to replace our souls with wraithbone sculptures."

traits.locale_text: “我们尊崇精于冶炼和制造的沃尔，但他与你们丑陋的神祇不同，他从不试图用雕饰的灵骨取代我们的灵魂。”

languages.text: « Nous vénérons Vaul, le forgeron artisan, mais il n'a rien à voir avec votre divinité répugnante. Jamais il n'a cherché à remplacer nos âmes par des sculptures en moelle spectrale. »
languages.original_text: "We venerated Vaul, the smith and craftsman, but he is nothing like your ugly deity — he has never sought to replace our souls with wraithbone sculptures."

traits.locale_text: « Nous vénérons Vaul, le forgeron artisan, mais il n'a rien à voir avec votre divinité répugnante. Jamais il n'a cherché à remplacer nos âmes par des sculptures en moelle spectrale. »

languages.text: "Wir haben Vaul verehrt, den Schmied und Handwerker, doch er ist nicht wie Eure hässliche Gottheit: Er hat nie versucht, unsere Seelen durch Skulpturen aus Phantomkristall zu ersetzen."
languages.original_text: "We venerated Vaul, the smith and craftsman, but he is nothing like your ugly deity — he has never sought to replace our souls with wraithbone sculptures."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben Vaul verehrt, den Schmied und Handwerker, doch er ist nicht wie Eure hässliche Gottheit: Er hat nie versucht, unsere Seelen durch Skulpturen aus Phantomkristall zu ersetzen."

languages.text: 「私たちは鍛冶屋であり職人であるヴァウルを崇拝していたが、彼はあなたたちの醜い神とは違う。彼は私たちの魂を幽骨の彫刻に置き換えようとしたことなどない」
languages.original_text: "We venerated Vaul, the smith and craftsman, but he is nothing like your ugly deity — he has never sought to replace our souls with wraithbone sculptures."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは鍛冶屋であり職人であるヴァウルを崇拝していたが、彼はあなたたちの醜い神とは違う。彼は私たちの魂を幽骨の彫刻に置き換えようとしたことなどない」

languages.text: «Veneramos a Vaul, el herrero y artesano, pero no se parece en nada a vuestra abominable deidad. Nunca ha querido sustituir nuestras almas por esculturas de hueso espectral».
languages.original_text: "We venerated Vaul, the smith and craftsman, but he is nothing like your ugly deity — he has never sought to replace our souls with wraithbone sculptures."

traits.locale_text: «Veneramos a Vaul, el herrero y artesano, pero no se parece en nada a vuestra abominable deidad. Nunca ha querido sustituir nuestras almas por esculturas de hueso espectral».

languages.original_text: "We venerated Vaul, the smith and craftsman, but he is nothing like your ugly deity — he has never sought to replace our souls with wraithbone sculptures."

languages.text: "Biz demirci ve zanaatkâr Vaul'a hürmet ederiz ama o sizin çirkin tanrınıza benzemez. Ruhlarımızı tayfkemik heykellerle değiştirmeyi amaçlamadı o hiç."
languages.original_text: "We venerated Vaul, the smith and craftsman, but he is nothing like your ugly deity — he has never sought to replace our souls with wraithbone sculptures."

traits.locale_text: "Biz demirci ve zanaatkâr Vaul'a hürmet ederiz ama o sizin çirkin tanrınıza benzemez. Ruhlarımızı tayfkemik heykellerle değiştirmeyi amaçlamadı o hiç."
